title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 70-1.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 70-1.1 - Application

State Regulations

The requirements of this Part shall apply to hospitals, residential health care facilities, and diagnostic and treatment centers (see section
2801
of the Public Health Law) and clinical laboratories (see section
571
of the Public Health Law). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
70-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
